        public RestrictedPlaylist(java.lang.String name,
                          Duration duration,
                          User user)
        Restricted Playlist's constructor.
        pre: All the parameters should be defined
        pos: Initializes the users array and adds the first user.
        Parameters:
        name. - Of type String, represents the name of the playlist.
        duration - Of type Duration, represents the current duration of the playlist.
        user - Of type User, represents the user that created the playlist.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
        adds a new user to the array of users.
        pre: The user must be defined
        pos: The first null position of the users array will be replaced by the user.
        Parameters:
        user. - Object of type user, used to insert into the users array.

      • isUser

        public boolean isUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Confirms whether an user is or is not part of the array of users.
        pre: The userName must belong to an existing user.
        pos:
        Parameters:
        userName. - User's username, used to confirm whether the user exists in the array.
        Returns:
        found. Of type boolean, its value represents whether the user was found or not.

      • usersToString

        public java.lang.String usersToString()
        Creates and returns a message that contains all the names of the users that can edit the playlist.
        pre: All the users must be defined and existing in the array.
        pos:
        Returns:
        out. Message with the user's usernames.
